org.steveleach.scoresheet.model

Interface ModelAware

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameFragment, GoalFragment, HistoryFragment, PenaltyFragment, PlayersFragment, ReportFragment, SavesFragment, ScoresheetActivity, ScoresheetFragment

    public interface ModelAware
    Interface used by components or classes that are aware of a ScoresheetModel.
    Author:
    Steve Leach

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onModelUpdated(ModelUpdate update)
      Method invoked when the model is updated.
      void setModel(ScoresheetModel model)
      Sets the ScoresheetModel that the component will use.
